meanings.definition: To happen or occur by chance.
meanings.sent1: One day, a lucky event may bechance you unexpectedly.
meanings.sent2: It would bechance that I meet my old friend at the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The idea of winning the lottery seemed to bechance him every time he bought a ticket.
meanings.sent4: As if by magic, good fortune bechanced upon the small town.
meanings.sent5: The rare opportunity to travel the world may bechance you sooner than you think.

meanings.sent1: The predicted storm did bechance just as the weatherman said.
